function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in the number of individuals contracting covid-19 and being exposed to sars-cov-2","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Indoor respiratory virus transmission","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to health hazards in the built environment during covid-19 lockdowns","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage and its correlation with reported covid-19 cases.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varying effects of methods in different risk buildings may result in inadequate disease prevention in high-risk buildings","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of disease transmission routes leading to ineffective containment measures","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly changing nature of covid-19 management, control, and prevention guidelines","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidance on non-essential travel may result in employees traveling to high-risk areas and bringing contagious diseases back to the workplace.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in obtaining data on the infectivity of sewage-borne sars-cov-2.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for virus spread in home environments","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Particles of respiratory origin being resuspended from the floor","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on masking alone for workplace outbreak prevention","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in vaccine distribution","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of high-risk areas for infection could lead to citizens being directed towards dangerous locations.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of face masks and social isolation measures may not be effective in containing the spread of the covid-19 virus.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for virus transmission in early design measures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trained rapid-response team to deal
